pages.text: You've managed to discover a way to create Draugr Necromancers, which shoots arrows of phantasmal energies and summons Draugrs to do its bidding. Rather than Skeletons, the ritual is performed on a Draugrs instead.

They can be taught to summon Elite Draugrs and Royal Draugrs as well, by right-clicking on them with the associated focuses. They cannot summon other types undead servants. Right-clicking on them with an empty hand will cause the Necromancer to summon Undead Servants for you. They are healed the same way as regular Draugr Servants.

Should a Draugr Necromancer fall, having an $(l:crafts/empty_soul_jar)Empty Soul Jar$() will cause their soul to fill it, which, when right-clicked on a Draugr, will revive them using said Draugr as their new body.
